infos.name: One Page Checkout
infos.description:
One Page Checkout - Der schnelle Weg zum Bestellabschluss

Live Demo: https://sw6demo1.premsoft.de

Alle bestellrelevanten Schritte wie Kundendaten, Zahlart, Versandart und Bestellzusammenfassung werden auf einer Seite zusammengefasst dargestellt. Der Standard Shopware Bestellprozess hingegen ist auf 3 Schritte verteilt wodurch sich Kunden umständlich durch mehrere Seiten klicken müssen. Mit unserem One Page Checkout hat Ihr Kunde alle wichtigen Informationen auf einmal im Blick was den Bestellprozess ungemein vereinfacht und die Abbruchrate von Bestellprozessen extrem verringern kann.

Mehr als 275 zufriedene Kunden

Mit über 275 Downloads wird unser One Page Checkout bereits in sehr vielen Shops genutzt.


Bereits 10 positive Bewertungen

Ein Auszug aus den Bewertungen:

  • Hier kann man nur Top Bewertungen geben. Dieser Plugin Hersteller gibt sich große Mühe und das Plugin steigert tatsächlich die Conversion Rate deutlich schon nach wenigen Tagen. Es wirkt viel übersichtlicher für den Kunden. Wir hatten ein Kompatibilitäts Problem mit einem anderen Plugin Hersteller welches von diesem Plugin Hersteller innerhalb weniger Stunden mit einem Fix Plugin behoben wurde. Nun können wir beide Plugins im Checkout nutzen. Danke an dieser Stelle noch mal an Euer Team für so viel Hilfe. Auch das Ihr unseren späteren Vorschlag noch umgesetzt habt. Wir können dieses Plugin und den Hersteller nur empfehlen. (Christian M. - 12.10.2021)
  • Die Bestellabbrüche sind deutlich reduziert und das Handling für unsere Kunden ist sehr leicht. (TX24 - 29.09.2021)
  • Da wir gute Erfahrungen mit SW5 gemacht haben, wollten wir den OnePageCheckout auch für SW6 einsetzen und hatten schon die Befürchtung größeren Arbeitsaufwand reinstecken zu müssen. Auch wenn wir sicher noch ein paar finale Anpassungen vornehmen, war die Installation und Einrichtung bis zu einem schicken Checkout ein Kinderspiel. (Kale&Me GmbH - 04.05.2021)

Viele Zahlarten und hohe Kompatibilität

Der One Page Checkout ist mit vielen Themes, Plugins und Zahlweisen kompatibel. Bitte prüfen Sie die Kompabilität dennoch zuerst mit einer Testversion des Plugins. Nachfolgend finden Sie eine Auswahl an geprüften Zahlarten.

✔ PayPal
✔ Amazon Pay
✔ Mollie
✔ Klarna Payments
✔ Payone Payment
✔ Unzer Payments
✔ Unzer Pay Later
✔ Stripe
✔ CrefoPay

Ist Ihre Zahlart nicht mit dabei? Das Plugin unterstützt auch viele weitere Zahlarten. Wir ergänzen oben stehende Liste beständig. Bitte prüfen Sie bis dahin am besten anhand der kostenlosen Testversion, ob auch Ihre Zahlart mit dabei ist.

Noch Fragen?
Schreiben Sie uns gerne eine E-Mail an support@premsoft.de

infos.name: One Page Checkout
infos.description:
One Page Checkout - Fast way to finish order

Live Demo: https://sw6demo1.premsoft.de

All order-relevant steps such as customer data, payment method, shipping method and order summary are summarized on one page. The standard Shopware order process, however, is spread over 3 steps, which means that customers have to click through several pages. With our One Page Checkout, your customer can see all the important information at once, which can greatly simplify the ordering process and dramatically reduce the cancellation rate of ordering processes.


More than 275 satisfied customers

With over 275 downloads, our One Page Checkout is already being used in many shops.


Already 10 positive reviews

An excerpt from the reviews:

  • Here you can only give top ratings. This plugin manufacturer tries very hard and the plugin actually increases the conversion rate significantly after just a few days. It looks much clearer for the customer. We had a compatibility problem with another plugin manufacturer which was fixed by this plugin manufacturer within a few hours with a fix plugin. Now we can use both plugins in the checkout. Thanks again to your team for so much help. Also that you implemented our later suggestion. We can only recommend this plugin and the manufacturer. (Christian M. - 12.10.2021 - Translated from German)
  • The order cancellations are significantly reduced and the handling for our customers is very easy. (TX24 - 29.09.2021 - Translated from German)
  • Since we had good experiences with SW5, we wanted to use the OnePageCheckout for SW6 as well and were afraid that we would have to put more work into it. Even though we will definitely make a few final adjustments, the installation and setup was child's play up to a chic checkout. (Kale&Me GmbH - 04.05.2021 - Translated from German)

Many payment methods and high compatibility

The One Page Checkout is compatible with many themes, plugins and payment methods. However, please check the compatibility first with a test version of the plugin. Below you will find a selection of tested payment methods.

✔ PayPal
✔ Amazon Pay
✔ Mollie
✔ Klarna Payments
✔ Payone Payment
✔ Unzer Payments
✔ Unzer Pay Later
✔ Stripe
✔ CrefoPay


Is your payment method not included? The plugin also supports many other payment methods. We are constantly adding to the above list. Until then, please use the free test version to check whether your payment method is included.

Any questions?

Do you have questions or need support: support@premsoft.de

changelog.text: - Added compatibility for Shopware 6.5.
- Fixed an issue with space between voucher and terms form.
- Implemented EasyCredit Plugin optimizations.
- Fixed an issue with Unzer payment on orders edited subsequently.
- Added missing information for Shopware html element "hidden-line-items-information".

- The PayPal Express button can be displayed above the register/login tab or below the login button.
- The form entries during registration are cached.

- Support for the Acris order info text has been added.
- Optimized position of PayPal Express Button.
- Implemented changes for Amazon Pay.
- Implemented changes for Unzer payment plugin.
- Fixed the problem that when a login error occurred, the new customer tab was opened.
- Fixed an issue with Mollie credit cart
- If an order is subsequently edited, the error messages are now displayed correctly.
- Fixed an issue related to the product dropdown when canceling the order with PayPal.

- Fixed an issue where a Javascript error message was displayed on the browser console.

- The new option "Disable state selection in checkout" has been implemented.
- Fixed a template issue for capture.
- Fixed an issue with clickable guest order checkbox.

- Fixed a display issue of the steps for Safari.
- An option was added to only show the guest order form in the checkout.

- The AGB checkbox can now be hidden.
- Fixed display issue of products on afterward order.
- When editing an order afterwards, the OnePageCheckout is now also displayed.

- Salutation can be disabled in checkout now.

- Added additional checkbox for checkout.
- Integrated AbstractLoginRoute as parameter in controller.
- Fixed an issue with zip/ city order on Shopware 6.4.
- Added compabiity for Shopware 6.4.
- Configuration works for subshops now.
- Fixed an issue with payment and shipping methods can now always be displayed.

- Integrated compability for Payone payment plugin.
- NL and FR localisation added.

- Available payment and shipping methods can now always be displayed.

- A problem with overlapping radio buttons in the address layer has been fixed

- The multiple click on the registration form is now prevented.
- Implemented compability for stripe plugin.

- Installation of a data protection checkbox.
- Voucher codes can now also be entered in the checkout.

- Payment and shipping methods can now be selected directly in the checkout (as in Shopware 5)
- Fixed issue with comment field.
- Integrated compability for klarna plugin.
- Fixed styling of birthday field.
- Step 2 and step 3 can be hidden by plugin option before login/ registration.
- Added compability for Shopware 6.3.x.
- Added missing block page_checkout_confirm_hidden_line_items_information.
- Fixed issue with login form.

- Fixed styling of comment area
- Products can be shown collapsed in the checkout.

- Terms and conditions errors are now colored.
- Now you can choose to display terms above 3 steps or above submit button.
Fixed issue with address manager in checkout.

- Compability change for new Shopware 6.1.0 RC 3 version.
- Added new feature "Show steps always vertical".
- Added new feature "Registration before login".

- Added new feature "Show no borders".
Compability change for SW 6.1.
Compability changes for new EA2 SW version.
Initial plugin version.
